long_description: From the zoo to the beach to the park, the BOB Revolution SE stroller offers sporty performance and safe, secure transport of a child as you adventure about. Made with a tough frame and durable fabric for lasting use; 2-step folding design supplies convenient transport and storage. 12.5 in. swiveling front wheel allows for excellent maneuverability; locks forward for increased stability jogging or when the terrain turns tough. In addition, the front wheel tracking can be easily adjusted with a dial to keep you rolling straight. High-impact polymer rear wheels are outfitted with inflatable tires that roll on everything from city streets to dirt trails. Padded and adjustable reclining seat offers great seating comfort; 5-point padded harness keeps child secure. Multi-position canopy can be adjusted for protection against the elements; large viewing window on top lets you keep an eye on the passenger. Internal seat pockets offer secure space for snacks and toys. Store extra clothing, food and more with the large seat-back pocket and Low Boy undercarriage cargo basket. Adjustable suspension system smooths out bumpy terrain and supplies a comfortable ride for precious cargo. Accessory adapter allows for quick and easy attachment of BOB Infant Car Seat Adapter (sold separately). Foot-actuated rear wheel parking brake on the BOB Revolution SE stroller ensures the stroller stays put until you're ready to roll.
short_description: From the zoo to the beach to the park, the BOB Revolution SE stroller offers sporty performance and safe, secure transport of a child as you adventure about.
